title.rendered: Professional Aircraft Accessories Hires Former Delta TechOps Executive

content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories, a Greenwich AeroGroup company, announced today the hiring of Jack Turnbill as its Senior Vice President of Business Development. A seasoned aviation veteran, Mr. Turnbill has served in roles supporting commercial airlines worldwide for more than 20 years.

In his new role, Mr. Turnbill will lead the company’s business development and sales for CR&O and Distribution. This includes the maintaining and growing of revenue in the company’s repair and overhaul of instrumentation, aircraft accessories, landing gear and airframe components for both fixed-wing and rotary-wing aircraft for the commercial, military and business aviation markets.

Prior to Professional Aircraft Accessories, Mr. Turnbill served as a consultant to Lockheed Martin Commercial Engine Solutions, and before that worked for Delta Airlines in various positions, with his most recent position held as Vice President of Technical Sales and Marketing for Delta TechOps.

He holds a Bachelor of Science degree in marketing from the University of North Carolina and an MBA in marketing from Kennesaw State University.
